full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement: Disk Duplicators and Sanitizers for Royal Canadian Mounted Police

### Solicitation Number
2BH2126889A

### Department
Gendarmerie royale du Canada (Royal Canadian Mounted Police)

### Notification Period
15 days (February 6 - February 21, 2023)

### Description
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police requires Disk Duplicators and Sanitizers, with the option to purchase additional quantities. The List of Deliverables is outlined in the Request for Quotation (RFQ). The delivery destination and date are detailed in Annex C.

### Important Dates
* Delivery Date: Within 30 federal working days from contract award or by March 31, 2023, whichever is sooner.
* Tender Closing Date: February 21, 2023, at 14:00:00

### Security Requirements
None

### Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements
None

### Trade Agreements
This tender is open to suppliers participating in the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Atlantic Procurement Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement.

### Regions of Opportunity
World

### Regions of Delivery
Canada

### Procurement Category
GD

### Notice Type
Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open bidding

### Contact Information
Alyssa Brook, Procurement Officer
Shared Services Canada
400 Cooper Street, 6th floor
Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K2P 2H8
Email: [alyssa.brook@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:alyssa.brook@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
Telephone: 343-548-0159

### Tender Documents
Access the solicitation and submit your bid by clicking the following link: [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login)

Note: The rewritten entry is more concise and well-structured, with the main details and information clearly outlined.
